mutants.code:
def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = 'MUTATED'
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word + ','
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result -= word + ','
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split('')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word + ','
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word - ','
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word * ','
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word + ','
    result = result.rstrip('')
    return result

def reverse_words(string):
    words = string.split(',')
    result = ''
    for word in reversed(words):
        result += word + ''
    result = result.rstrip(',')
    return result
